channel.title: Iron Sights
channel.description:
I'm probably just stupid and couldn't find them when they're completely obvious, but how do you use iron sights on the weapons? I didn't see a keyboard option for it.
(if this was asked before I'm sorry, I tried a search and only found four threads that had too many pages too look through.)

item.title: Iron Sights
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Right click. It only works on the .357

Read full topic
